TopicTitle: All piloted vessels are treated as probes with limited control.

Articles.Content:
Hi, I'm having some major problems playing on a modded save of KSP. For whatever reason, my game thinks that any vessel (including ones with pilots in command pods) is a probe, and that probe has limited control. I've used the cheats menu to see what might be causing it, and all I have is this:

 

https://imgur.com/R7pGoZZ

All of my mods were downloaded through CKAN, and below is my modlist because I have no idea which mods are creating this interaction. Does anyone know of any mods that would break vessel control like this or what could possibly be causing my issue? 

(ATHSS) AtomicTech Hardware Serializing System (AtomicTechFlags-ATHSS 1.0)
Ablative-Airbrake (AblativeAirbrake 1.0.3)
ABookCase Orbital Reference System (ABCORS 0.5.1.6)
Airships (Heisenberg v2.19.0)
Alcubierre Warp Drive (Stand-alone) (AlcubierreStandalone v112.0.1)
